mapper.select:
SELECT C.NO , MEM.NICK AS TEACHER_NO ,CATE.NAME as CATEGORY ,C.CLASS_NAME ,C.CLASS_CONTENT ,C.RECOMM ,C.STUDENT_CNT ,C.PRICE ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.DELETE_YN ,C.CLASS_CNT
FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_CATE CATE ON C.CATEGORY = CATE.NO
JOIN TEACHER TEA ON C.TEACHER_NO = TEA.MEMBER_NO
JOIN MEMBER MEM ON TEA.MEMBER_NO = MEM.NO
WHERE C.NO =#{bno}
